lives_key1:
Ab aapko ek feature implement karna hai, jisse ki user ke paas limited chances ho.
Maan lete hai ki user ke paas sirf 8 chances hai - aur aapko apne loop ko aise modify karna hai ki user ke paas 8 chances ho.
lives_key2:
Inn 8 chances ke baad, user ka game over ho jaye.
Aur jab bhi user ka koi bhi galat guess ho toh - aap uska ek chance kam kar de.
Jab bhi user ka guess theek ho, toh aap uski number of lives ko kam na karein.
lives_key4: Iske liye aapko ek temporary variable ki jaroorat padegi - jis mei aap remaining lives store kareinge. Chale iss variable ko remaining_lives hi bol lete hai.
lives_key5: Aap ko iss variable ko 8 se initialise karna hoga.
lives_key6: Aap ko sahi se samajhna hoga ki kab kab yeh variable ko change karna hai.
lives_key7: Aap ko sahi se samajhna hoga ki jab yeh variable zero ho jaye, toh aap
lives_key8: kaha par check karoge ki yeh variable ab zero ho gaya hai
lives_key9: jab yeh zero ho jayega toh aap kya karenge uss condition ko handle karne ke liye
lives_key12: Aap yeh kaam alag tarah se bhi kar sakte hai, yeh sirf ek possible solution hai. Koshish karein ki hint mei pooche hue saare questions par aap ko clarity ho.
